All files are put into the subdirectories of {{{/WEB-INF/classes/}}}. The fresnel configuration belongs into the {{{fresnel.n3}}} file in the {{{configurations}}} directory, the data files into the {{{data}}} directory and the ontology files into the {{{ontologies}}} directory. You can also [faq3 use a Sesame (2.1.3) HTTP repository] for your data!
